MessageDispatched(uint256,(uint256,uint2.details: Emitted when a message is dispatched with its associated message ID and message struct.

params.message: - The message struct associated with this event.
params.messageId: - The message ID associated with the dispatched message.

calculateMessageHash((uint256,uint256,ui.details: Calculates and returns the hash of a given message.

params.message: - The `Message` structure containing various fields to be hashed.

returns._0: hash The keccak256 hash of the message, represented as a 32-byte hexadecimal string.

calculateMessageId(uint256,address,bytes.details: Calculates and returns a unique identifier (ID) for a message.

params.dispatcherAddress: - The address of the dispatcher sending the message.
params.messageHash: - The keccak256 hash of the message, represented as a 32-byte hexadecimal string.
params.sourceChainId: - The ID of the chain from which the message originates.

returns._0: messageId The unique identifier for the message, calculated based on the input parameters.

dispatchMessage(uint256,uint256,address,.details: Dispatches a message to a specified chain with a set of validation parameters without calling the reporters. It just write in storage a commitment of message. In order to dispatch it to the reporters, you must then invoke `relayMessagesToAdapters`

params.adapters: - An array of `IAdapter` contracts (for later validation use).
params.data: - The data being sent in the message, represented as a byte array.
params.receiver: - The address of the receiver on the target chain.
params.reporters: - An array of `IReporter` contracts (not actively used in this step).
params.targetChainId: - The ID of the target chain to which the message is being sent.
params.threshold: - The minimum number of adapters required to have stored the same message.

returns._0: messageId A unique identifier for the dispatched message, used for tracking and subsequent validation.

dispatchMessageToAdapters(uint256,uint25.details: Dispatches a message to a specified chain with a set of validation parameters and calls the reporters.

params.adapters: - An array of `IAdapter` contracts (for later validation use).
params.data: - The data being sent in the message, represented as a byte array.
params.receiver: - The address of the receiver on the target chain.
params.reporters: - An array of `IReporter` contracts (not actively used in this step).
params.targetChainId: - The ID of the target chain to which the message is being sent.
params.threshold: - The minimum number of adapters required to have stored the same message.

returns._0: (messageId, result) A unique identifier for the dispatched message and an array of byte arrays, where each element is the result of dispatching a respective message to the corresponding Reporter.

dispatchMessagesToAdapters(uint256,uint2.details: Dispatches an array of messages to specified chains and calls the reporters.

params.adapters: - An array of `IAdapter` contracts used for the validation of each message.
params.data: - An array of data payloads for each message, represented as byte arrays.
params.receivers: - An array of addresses for the receivers on the target chain, one for each message.
params.reporters: - An array of `IReporter` contracts for reporting the status of each message.
params.targetChainId: - The ID of the target chain for all messages.
params.thresholds: - An array of minimum validation thresholds required for each message.

returns._0: (messageIds, result) An array of unique identifiers for the dispatched messages and an array of bytes32 arrays, where each element is the result of dispatching a respective message to the corresponding Reporter.

getPendingMessageHash(uint256).details: Retrieves the hash of a pending message that was dispatched via `dispatchMessage` but has not yet been relayed to adapters using `relayingMessagesToAdapters`.

params.messageId: - The unique identifier of the message for which the hash is being retrieved.

returns._0: messageHash The hash of the pending message if it exists.

relayMessagesToAdapters((uint256,uint256.details: Relays an array of messages to their respective adapters. In order to be able to aggregate messages within the reporter, it's mandatory that all messages have the same targetChainId, reporters and adapters.

params.messages: - An array of `Message` structures to be relayed to the adapters.

returns._0: result An array of bytes32 arrays, where each element is the result of dispatching a respective all messages to the corresponding Reporter.
